definitions.definition: A game (originally Chinese) for four players, using a collection of tiles divided into five or six suits .
A solitaire game using the same tiles , where the player wins by removing pairs of matching exposed tiles until none remain.

main_definition: A game (originally Chinese) for four players, using a collection of tiles divided into five or six suits .
secondary_definitions: A solitaire game using the same tiles , where the player wins by removing pairs of matching exposed tiles until none remain.
